content: the easy peasy sweater is a super simple pattern just like the name says it s easy peasy it s worked top down with a raglan yoke and 2x2 rib cuffs in a different colour it has an oversized fit and wide sleeves that make it super comfortable and cozy circumference after blocking approximately 90 100 110 120 130 142 154 166 178 cm or 35 39 43 47 51 56 60 65 70 inches consider about 25/30 cm or 10 inches of positive ease happy knitting thank you madeleine
